trans-unit.source: Describes the serviceâ€™s authentication behavior.
Creates a new instance of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceAuthenticationBehavior"></xref>.
Gets or sets the value that represents the authentication scheme used by the service.
The authentication scheme used by the service.
Gets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthenticationManager"></xref> associated with this behavior.
Returns <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthenticationManager"></xref>.
Returns whether the service should serialize authentication schemes.
`True` if the service should serialize authentication schemes; otherwise, `false`.
`true` if the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthenticationManager"></xref> should be serialized; otherwise, `false`.
Returns <xref href="System.Boolean"></xref>.

An implementation of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.AddBindingParameters(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription,System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase,System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection{System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint},System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection)"></xref> method.
This method is called once for each listen URI.
For example, if a service has four endpoints, and two of them have the same listen URI, then this method gets called three times.
The reason is that the `bindingParameters` target each channel stack and there is one channel stack for each listen URI.

Because each call receives those endpoints at that listen URI, two calls each get a single <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>, and one call gets a collection of two <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> objects.
The service description of the service.
The host of the service.
The service endpoints.
Custom objects to which binding elements have access.

An implementation of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription,System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase)"></xref> method.
The service description.
The host that is currently being built.

An implementation of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceAuthenticationBehavior.System#ServiceModel#Description#IServiceBehavior#Validate(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription,System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase)"></xref> method.
The service description.
The service host that is currently being constructed.
